code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const eventsByYear={2025:[{name:"Mistrovstv√≠ Evropy",date:"08/2025",hidden:false},{name:"Mistrovstv√≠ ƒåR",date:"06/2025",hidden:false},{name:"GP Framar Praha",date:"05/2025",hidden:false}],2024:[{name:"GP Brno Sprint",date:"06/2024",hidden:false}]};const Home=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[selectedYear,setSelectedYear]=useState(Math.max(...Object.keys(eventsByYear).map(Number)));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"Hello, Cycling World! \uD83D\uDEB4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"year-buttons",children:Object.keys(eventsByYear).sort((a,b)=>b-a).map(year=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedYear(Number(year)),className:"button",children:year},year))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"events-container",children:eventsByYear[selectedYear].filter(event=>!event.hidden).map((event,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card",onClick:()=>navigate(`/event/${event.name.replace(/\s+/g,"-").toLowerCase()}`),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"event-name",children:event.name})," - ",event.date]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer",children:"\u2764\uFE0F Enjoy your ride! \u2764\uFE0F "})]});};export default Home;
